#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- editorplugin_historyinspector.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Editor"
		"Editor/MainEditorWindow.cpp"
		"Editor/MainEditorWindow.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"DLLMain.cpp"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
		"StdAfx.h"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEditorPlugin(EditorUQS_HistoryInspector PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryPlugins/CryUQS")
target_link_libraries (${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
	Sandbox
	EditorCommon
	CryUQS_Shared
)

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
	PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/.." "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/GeneratedFiles"
)

if(OPTION_UQS_SCHEMATYC_SUPPORT)
	target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
		PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CrySchematyc/Core/Interface"
		PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CrySchematyc/STDEnv/Interface"
	)
endif()
